meanings.definition: Stengahs: plural noun, a type of cocktail made with whiskey and soda water.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious stengahs to all the guests.
meanings.sent2: I ordered two stengahs at the bar last night.
meanings.sent3: The bartender accidentally spilled stengahs all over the counter.
meanings.sent4: The stengahs flowed like a river at the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of stengahs filled the room, tempting everyone to try a sip.

meanings.definition: Stengahs: verb, to mix whiskey and soda water to make a cocktail.
meanings.sent1: She stengahs the ingredients carefully to create the perfect drink.
meanings.sent2: I always stengahs my favorite cocktail when I have friends over.
meanings.sent3: He likes to stengahs his drinks with a twist of lemon for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: The bartender expertly stengahs the drinks, impressing the customers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of ice clinking as she stengahs the cocktail is music to my ears.
